reviews.text: We checked in late at night without a prior booking - no problem and they honoured a discount voucher which we had. Great value for money - the room could not be faulted and their hot breakfast an added bonus. I can highly recommend this hotel.
reviews.title: Wonderful hotel

likes.liked: — Comfy clean and neatly decorated rooms

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed October 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: We stayed here for 3 nights for a horse show. It is a very nice new motel, conveniently located just off I-75. The furnishings and bedding are plush. Hotel employees were courteous and efficient.
reviews.title: Wonderful Facility

reviews.text: There are a few grocery stores and pharmacies within a couple of miles.
reviews.title: Beautiful, new hotel

likes.disliked: — in the middle of nowhere and the beds were uncomfortable.

reviews.text: This is a fairly new hotel so it was very clean and everyone was very nice. The only complaint I had was the beds were very hard! The rooms are not actually a suite since its 2 queen beds and a sofa sleeper all in one room. This was a nice hotel though. We went to Ocala for Silver Springs and enjoyed it. There is however absolutely nothing else to do in this town. We could not even find an ice cream place anywhere near the hotel.
reviews.title: Good hotel

reviews.text: We stayed at the Comfort Suites July 2007 in room 506. The hotel was very quiet. Right off I-75. Rooms had 2 full beds and a full size sleeper sofa. I just couldnt get the air conditioner to work to my liking. It would run all night without turning off. The room would be freezing until I shut it off, then it would become to warm. I think this was probably operator error! The room and bathroom were average size. Room was clean. Breakfast was good. Krispy creme donuts, great coffee, small selection of cereal and fruit, make your own pancakes.Scramble eggs ran out about 9am and no more were made. Two computers in the business center, or free wifi in your room. Hotel is around 25 mins to Silver Springs. Mall is one exit away. Wanted to go horseback riding, but couldnt find a place that had trailrides-even though you are in horse country. It was a very pleasant stay and would return if in the area again. $80 senior rate per nite.
reviews.title: Great Hotel!!!

reviews.text: I stayed here for more than a week on business and found the lobby and room to be immaculate, quiet, and comfortable. There is plenty of free parking, the high speed wireless internet is included in the room rate (and my connection was excellent), and the free buffet breakfast was pretty good (I'm not much of a breakfast eater but I had waffles a couple of times.) My room had two queen sized beds (very comfortable, a couch, a desk, and a bureau with a TV. The room itself was huge for a budget hotel.
reviews.title: Very new, very clean, really inexpensive

likes.disliked: — View of the highway, although no noise

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed January 2008, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: The room had a fridge, freezer, and microwave, and there's a supermarket right up the street so I had a couple of meals in the room. Otherwise, there are plenty of nearby restaurants. Big Apple Eatery was pretty good for delivery.
reviews.title: Nice Hotel

likes.disliked: — Bathroom door would not stay open, kept having to prop it.

reviews.text: The staff were friendly and polite, there's a coin op laundry on the second floor, and a place to purchase stuff like laundry soap and snacks at the lobby.
reviews.title: Huge Rooms, very clean

reviews.text: I'll stay here again if business brings me back to the Ocala area.
reviews.title: Loved our stay

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed December 2007, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: This hotel was very nice, clean (except I think the shower curtain could have used a cleaning, it had an odor) everything else was very clean though. It was a nice size room with a big plush king size bed. The staff was very nice and the continental breakfast was fine although I only had the waffles. The price was good for the value and the location was good enough for me ( we went to Silver Springs park) about a 15 minute drive. No restaurants in the immediate area but we went to 2 exits south (only a few minutes drive) and there were plenty of chain restaurants to choose from. I would stay here again.
reviews.title: New & Clean, Wonderful Stay

likes.liked: — It was VERY CLEAN & brand new!
likes.disliked: — the elevator, it talked to you & I find that annoying.
